projects.name: Milestone 3: Signal Processing
projects.description: Trust policy and external signal funnel

issues.title: Milestone 1: Define & Implement Zod Schema for ANS Registration Payload
issues.description:
Define a strict Zod schema for the ANS auto-registration payload, including required fields, qualification metadata, trust score, and signing metadata. Add unit tests to validate acceptance/rejection and document the schema.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Zod schema covers all ANS registration fields
- [ ] Unit tests for valid/invalid payloads
- [ ] Documentation with examples
- [ ] Integration with existing role agent creation flow

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Tests passing (unit + integration)
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced

issues.title: Milestone 1: Implement Signed & Idempotent ANS Registration
issues.description:
Add HMAC or DID-based signing for payloads sent from SCK Platform to knaight.site. Ensure ANS registration is idempotent (upsert behavior) and verify signatures on the registry side. Prevent replay attacks.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] HMAC signing implementation for ANS payloads
- [ ] Signature verification on knaight.site
- [ ] Idempotent registration (safe to retry)
- [ ] Replay attack prevention
- [ ] Error handling for signature failures

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Security review completed
- [ ] End-to-end tests for signing flow
- [ ] Documentation for cross-domain security
- [ ] Performance impact assessed

issues.title: Milestone 1: Build Retry Queue for Failed ANS Registrations
issues.description:
Create a persistent retry mechanism with exponential backoff for failed ANS registrations. Surface failures with reason and timestamps. Store status and allow manual re-trigger from UI.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Persistent queue for failed registrations
- [ ] Exponential backoff retry logic
- [ ] Failure reason tracking and storage
- [ ] Manual retry trigger from admin UI
- [ ] Queue status monitoring

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Queue resilience tested under load
- [ ] Admin UI shows queue status
- [ ] Alerting for persistent failures
- [ ] Database migration for queue storage

issues.title: Milestone 1: Add Visibility Flag to Role Agents and Respect in ANS Publishing
issues.description:
Introduce `public`/`internal`/`hidden` visibility controls on Role Agents. Update auto-ANS registration logic to skip or hide agents based on this flag. Expose visibility toggles in admin UI.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Database schema updated with visibility field
- [ ] ANS registration respects visibility settings
- [ ] Admin UI toggle for visibility control
- [ ] Migration script for existing agents
- [ ] API filtering based on visibility

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Database migration tested
- [ ] UI components updated
- [ ] API documentation updated
- [ ] Backward compatibility maintained

issues.title: Milestone 1: UI Component - ANS Publish Status with Retry
issues.description:
Build a React component showing current ANS registration status for a Role Agent (published, pending, failed). Provide manual retry and error detail display. Include correlation ID for tracing.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Status component with published/pending/failed states
- [ ] Manual retry button with loading state
- [ ] Error details display with correlation ID
- [ ] Real-time status updates
- [ ] Accessible design (WCAG compliance)

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Component tested with Storybook
- [ ] Integration tests for retry flow
- [ ] UX review completed
- [ ] Mobile responsive design

issues.title: Milestone 1: Add Audit Correlation IDs Across Role Agent → ANS Flow
issues.description:
Ensure role agent creation, signal ingestion, ANS registration, and verification all carry and log a shared correlation ID for debugging and traceability. Expose relevant logs in internal admin dashboard.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Correlation ID generated at role agent creation
- [ ] ID propagated through entire ANS flow
- [ ] Structured logging with correlation ID
- [ ] Admin dashboard log search by correlation ID
- [ ] API responses include correlation ID

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] End-to-end tracing verified
- [ ] Log aggregation configured
- [ ] Admin dashboard functional
- [ ] Documentation for debugging workflow

issues.title: Milestone 2: Build Embeddable Verification Widget
issues.description:
Design and implement a lightweight embeddable 'Trust Badge' widget that external sites can drop in to verify a Role Agent by ANS ID. Fetch trust status, show provenance, and degrade gracefully on failure.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Lightweight JavaScript widget (< 50KB)
- [ ] Trust badge with ANS ID verification
- [ ] Provenance display (external signal sources)
- [ ] Graceful degradation on API failures
- [ ] Customizable styling options

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Widget tested on multiple sites
- [ ] Performance benchmarking completed
- [ ] Integration documentation published
- [ ] CDN deployment configured

issues.title: Milestone 2: Public Verification API with Rate Limiting & Caching
issues.description:
Expose a public API for third parties to verify Role Agent trust status. Implement rate limiting to protect the endpoint and caching for performance. Support free vs gated access (stub micropayment later).

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Public verification API endpoint
- [ ] Rate limiting by IP and API key
- [ ] Response caching for performance
- [ ] Free tier vs premium access tiers
- [ ] API key management system

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Load testing completed
- [ ] API documentation published
- [ ] Monitoring and alerting configured
- [ ] Billing integration stubbed

issues.title: Milestone 2: Documentation for Embed Widget & Verification Flow
issues.description:
Write clear docs for how to consume the embeddable verification widget and the public verification API. Include example integrations, expected payloads, and failure handling.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Widget integration guide with examples
- [ ] API documentation with OpenAPI spec
- [ ] Error handling best practices
- [ ] Example implementations (React, vanilla JS)
- [ ] Troubleshooting guide

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Documentation review by external developer
- [ ] Examples tested and validated
- [ ] Published to secure-knaight.org
- [ ] Developer onboarding flow tested

issues.title: Milestone 3: Finalize Minimal External Signal Funnel Schema & Retire Overengineered Version
issues.description:
Lock down the simplified signal schema (external trust score + certification metadata), migrate consumers to it, and archive the previous overengineered signal collection service. Ensure backward compatibility if needed.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Simplified signal schema finalized
- [ ] Migration script for existing signals
- [ ] Overengineered service archived
- [ ] Backward compatibility layer if needed
- [ ] Performance improvement metrics

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] All consumers migrated successfully
- [ ] Legacy code moved to /archive
- [ ] Performance benchmarks met
- [ ] Schema documentation updated

issues.title: Milestone 3: Implement Trust Policy Editor UI
issues.description:
Enable admins to define trust thresholds for level assignment (L1–L5) and NFT eligibility. Provide live previews showing how incoming signals would influence level promotions.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Admin UI for trust threshold configuration
- [ ] Live preview of level assignments
- [ ] Validation of threshold logic
- [ ] Impact analysis for threshold changes
- [ ] Role-based access control

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] UI tested with real data
- [ ] Admin workflow documented
- [ ] Access control implemented
- [ ] Change audit trail functional

issues.title: Milestone 3: Automatic Level Assignment & Promotion Logic
issues.description:
Implement and test `assignLevel` and `canPromoteLevel` logic based solely on external trust scores. Ensure promotions are suggested and surfaced in the UI with explanation.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Level assignment logic implemented
- [ ] Promotion suggestions in UI
- [ ] Explanation of promotion rationale
- [ ] Batch processing for level updates
- [ ] Notification system for promotions

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Logic tested with edge cases
- [ ] UI shows promotion explanations
- [ ] Batch processing optimized
- [ ] Audit trail for level changes

issues.title: Milestone 4: Enforce NFT Minting Eligibility Rules
issues.description:
Ensure backend minting endpoint only allows credential minting for Role Agents meeting NFT eligibility (e.g., L4+ with threshold). Add rejection reasons and audit logging.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Eligibility validation in minting endpoint
- [ ] Clear rejection reasons returned
- [ ] Audit logging for minting attempts
- [ ] UI shows eligibility status
- [ ] Gas cost optimization

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Security review of minting logic
- [ ] Edge cases tested
- [ ] Audit system functional
- [ ] Performance benchmarks met

issues.title: Milestone 4: Role Agent Decoupling / Idle State Management
issues.description:
Support setting Role Agents to idle, decoupling from DID without deletion, and reflecting this in UI and ANS (optionally retracting public listing).

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Idle state in database schema
- [ ] UI for setting agents idle
- [ ] ANS retraction on idle state
- [ ] Re-activation workflow
- [ ] Audit trail for state changes

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] State machine tested
- [ ] UI workflow validated
- [ ] ANS integration working
- [ ] Data integrity maintained

issues.title: Milestone 4: Versioned Anchor / Re-mint Workflow
issues.description:
Allow re-anchoring (versioned NFT) when trust state changes significantly. Track prior anchors, show diffs, and enable admin-triggered refresh with audit trail.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Versioned NFT contract support
- [ ] Re-mint trigger logic
- [ ] Version history tracking
- [ ] Diff visualization in UI
- [ ] Admin approval workflow

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Contract security audited
- [ ] Version migration tested
- [ ] UI shows clear version history
- [ ] Gas cost analysis completed

issues.title: Milestone 5: Archive Legacy Code & Enforce No-Hardcoded-Domain Rule
issues.description:
Move deprecated code (old NFT contract, overengineered signal service, duplicate routes) into `/archive`, add README tags. Add lint/pre-commit rule rejecting hardcoded domain strings in source.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Legacy code moved to /archive
- [ ] Archive README documentation
- [ ] Linting rules for hardcoded domains
- [ ] Pre-commit hooks configured
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline updated

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] All legacy code archived
- [ ] Linting rules active
- [ ] CI pipeline validates rules
- [ ] Documentation updated

issues.title: Milestone 5: Health Check Endpoint & Admin Health UI
issues.description:
Expose an aggregated health endpoint summarizing: ANS sync status, signal freshness, NFT anchor validity, domain configuration drift. Build a small admin UI panel displaying these with alerts.

- [ ] Admin UI health dashboard

**Definition of Done:**

- [ ] UI shows actionable alerts
- [ ] Monitoring integration complete
- [ ] Performance impact minimal
